PAM.AX.summary: Pan Asia Metals Limited engages in the exploration and development of specialty and base metal projects in South East Asia. It primarily holds 100% interest in the Khao Soon Tungsten Project, Reung Kiet Lithium Project, Bang Now Lithium Project, and Minter Tungsten Project located in the South East Asian Tin - Tungsten Belt. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based Bangkok, Thailand.
